ðŸ“– Summary: The `trmt` repository provides a terminal-based 2D Turing machine (turmite) simulator. It allows users to simulate multiple turmites simultaneously with customizable rules, colors, and characters. The simulator offers features like Unicode support, configurable parameters, real-time interaction, and deterministic seed-based simulations.
